2685 void QgsPalLayerSettings::parseTextFormatting()
2686 {
2687  QVariant exprVal; // value() is repeatedly nulled on data defined evaluation and replaced when successful
2688 
2689  // data defined multiline wrap character?
2690  QString wrapchr = wrapChar;
2691  if ( dataDefinedValEval( "string", QgsPalLayerSettings::MultiLineWrapChar, exprVal ) )
2692  {
2693  wrapchr = exprVal.toString();
2694  }
2695 
2696  // data defined multiline height?
2697  dataDefinedValEval( "double", QgsPalLayerSettings::MultiLineHeight, exprVal );
2698 
2699  // data defined multiline text align?
2700  if ( dataDefinedEvaluate( QgsPalLayerSettings::MultiLineAlignment, exprVal ) )
2701  {
2702  QString str = exprVal.toString().trimmed();
2703  QgsDebugMsgLevel( QString( "exprVal MultiLineAlignment:%1" ).arg( str ), 4 );
2704 
2705  if ( !str.isEmpty() )
2706  {
2707  // "Left"
2708  QgsPalLayerSettings::MultiLineAlign aligntype = QgsPalLayerSettings::MultiLeft;
2709 
2710  if ( str.compare( "Center", Qt::CaseInsensitive ) == 0 )
2711  {
2712  aligntype = QgsPalLayerSettings::MultiCenter;
2713  }
2714  else if ( str.compare( "Right", Qt::CaseInsensitive ) == 0 )
2715  {
2716  aligntype = QgsPalLayerSettings::MultiRight;
2717  }
2718  dataDefinedValues.insert( QgsPalLayerSettings::MultiLineAlignment, QVariant(( int )aligntype ) );
2719  }
2720  }
2721 
2722  // data defined direction symbol?
2723  bool drawDirSymb = addDirectionSymbol;
2724  if ( dataDefinedValEval( "bool", QgsPalLayerSettings::DirSymbDraw, exprVal ) )
2725  {
2726  drawDirSymb = exprVal.toBool();
2727  }
2728 
2729  if ( drawDirSymb )
2730  {
2731  // data defined direction left symbol?
2732  dataDefinedValEval( "string", QgsPalLayerSettings::DirSymbLeft, exprVal );
2733 
2734  // data defined direction right symbol?
2735  dataDefinedValEval( "string", QgsPalLayerSettings::DirSymbRight, exprVal );
2736 
2737  // data defined direction symbol placement?
2738  if ( dataDefinedEvaluate( QgsPalLayerSettings::DirSymbPlacement, exprVal ) )
2739  {
2740  QString str = exprVal.toString().trimmed();
2741  QgsDebugMsgLevel( QString( "exprVal DirSymbPlacement:%1" ).arg( str ), 4 );
2742 
2743  if ( !str.isEmpty() )
2744  {
2745  // "LeftRight"
2746  QgsPalLayerSettings::DirectionSymbols placetype = QgsPalLayerSettings::SymbolLeftRight;
2747 
2748  if ( str.compare( "Above", Qt::CaseInsensitive ) == 0 )
2749  {
2750  placetype = QgsPalLayerSettings::SymbolAbove;
2751  }
2752  else if ( str.compare( "Below", Qt::CaseInsensitive ) == 0 )
2753  {
2754  placetype = QgsPalLayerSettings::SymbolBelow;
2755  }
2756  dataDefinedValues.insert( QgsPalLayerSettings::DirSymbPlacement, QVariant(( int )placetype ) );
2757  }
2758  }
2759 
2760  // data defined direction symbol reversed?
2761  dataDefinedValEval( "bool", QgsPalLayerSettings::DirSymbReverse, exprVal );
2762  }
2763 
2764  // formatting for numbers is inline with generation of base label text and not passed to label painting
2765 }

2767 void QgsPalLayerSettings::parseShapeBackground()
2768 {
2769  QVariant exprVal; // value() is repeatedly nulled on data defined evaluation and replaced when successful
2770 
2771  // data defined draw shape?
2772  bool drawShape = shapeDraw;
2773  if ( dataDefinedValEval( "bool", QgsPalLayerSettings::ShapeDraw, exprVal ) )
2774  {
2775  drawShape = exprVal.toBool();
2776  }
2777 
2778  if ( !drawShape )
2779  {
2780  return;
2781  }
2782 
2783  // data defined shape transparency?
2784  int shapeTransp = shapeTransparency;
2785  if ( dataDefinedValEval( "transp", QgsPalLayerSettings::ShapeTransparency, exprVal ) )
2786  {
2787  shapeTransp = exprVal.toInt();
2788  }
2789 
2790  drawShape = ( drawShape && shapeTransp < 100 ); // size is not taken into account (could be)
2791 
2792  if ( !drawShape )
2793  {
2794  dataDefinedValues.insert( QgsPalLayerSettings::ShapeDraw, QVariant( false ) ); // trigger value
2795  dataDefinedValues.remove( QgsPalLayerSettings::ShapeTransparency );
2796  return; // don't bother evaluating values that won't be used
2797  }
2798 
2799  // data defined shape kind?
2800  QgsPalLayerSettings::ShapeType shapeKind = shapeType;
2801  if ( dataDefinedEvaluate( QgsPalLayerSettings::ShapeKind, exprVal ) )
2802  {
2803  QString skind = exprVal.toString().trimmed();
2804  QgsDebugMsgLevel( QString( "exprVal ShapeKind:%1" ).arg( skind ), 4 );
2805 
2806  if ( !skind.isEmpty() )
2807  {
2808  // "Rectangle"
2809  QgsPalLayerSettings::ShapeType shpkind = QgsPalLayerSettings::ShapeRectangle;
2810 
2811  if ( skind.compare( "Square", Qt::CaseInsensitive ) == 0 )
2812  {
2813  shpkind = QgsPalLayerSettings::ShapeSquare;
2814  }
2815  else if ( skind.compare( "Ellipse", Qt::CaseInsensitive ) == 0 )
2816  {
2817  shpkind = QgsPalLayerSettings::ShapeEllipse;
2818  }
2819  else if ( skind.compare( "Circle", Qt::CaseInsensitive ) == 0 )
2820  {
2821  shpkind = QgsPalLayerSettings::ShapeCircle;
2822  }
2823  else if ( skind.compare( "SVG", Qt::CaseInsensitive ) == 0 )
2824  {
2825  shpkind = QgsPalLayerSettings::ShapeSVG;
2826  }
2827  shapeKind = shpkind;
2828  dataDefinedValues.insert( QgsPalLayerSettings::ShapeKind, QVariant(( int )shpkind ) );
2829  }
2830  }
2831 
2832  // data defined shape SVG path?
2833  QString svgPath = shapeSVGFile;
2834  if ( dataDefinedEvaluate( QgsPalLayerSettings::ShapeSVGFile, exprVal ) )
2835  {
2836  QString svgfile = exprVal.toString().trimmed();
2837  QgsDebugMsgLevel( QString( "exprVal ShapeSVGFile:%1" ).arg( svgfile ), 4 );
2838 
2839  // '' empty paths are allowed
2840  svgPath = svgfile;
2841  dataDefinedValues.insert( QgsPalLayerSettings::ShapeSVGFile, QVariant( svgfile ) );
2842  }
2843 
2844  // data defined shape size type?
2845  QgsPalLayerSettings::SizeType shpSizeType = shapeSizeType;
2846  if ( dataDefinedEvaluate( QgsPalLayerSettings::ShapeSizeType, exprVal ) )
2847  {
2848  QString stype = exprVal.toString().trimmed();
2849  QgsDebugMsgLevel( QString( "exprVal ShapeSizeType:%1" ).arg( stype ), 4 );
2850 
2851  if ( !stype.isEmpty() )
2852  {
2853  // "Buffer"
2854  QgsPalLayerSettings::SizeType sizType = QgsPalLayerSettings::SizeBuffer;
2855 
2856  if ( stype.compare( "Fixed", Qt::CaseInsensitive ) == 0 )
2857  {
2858  sizType = QgsPalLayerSettings::SizeFixed;
2859  }
2860  shpSizeType = sizType;
2861  dataDefinedValues.insert( QgsPalLayerSettings::ShapeSizeType, QVariant(( int )sizType ) );
2862  }
2863  }
2864 
2865  // data defined shape size X? (SVGs only use X for sizing)
2866  double ddShpSizeX = shapeSize.x();
2867  if ( dataDefinedValEval( "double", QgsPalLayerSettings::ShapeSizeX, exprVal ) )
2868  {
2869  ddShpSizeX = exprVal.toDouble();
2870  }
2871 
2872  // data defined shape size Y?
2873  double ddShpSizeY = shapeSize.y();
2874  if ( dataDefinedValEval( "double", QgsPalLayerSettings::ShapeSizeY, exprVal ) )
2875  {
2876  ddShpSizeY = exprVal.toDouble();
2877  }
2878 
2879  // don't continue under certain circumstances (e.g. size is fixed)
2880  bool skip = false;
2881  if ( shapeKind == QgsPalLayerSettings::ShapeSVG
2882  && ( svgPath.isEmpty()
2883  || ( !svgPath.isEmpty()
2884  && shpSizeType == QgsPalLayerSettings::SizeFixed
2885  && ddShpSizeX == 0.0 ) ) )
2886  {
2887  skip = true;
2888  }
2889  if ( shapeKind != QgsPalLayerSettings::ShapeSVG
2890  && shpSizeType == QgsPalLayerSettings::SizeFixed
2891  && ( ddShpSizeX == 0.0 || ddShpSizeY == 0.0 ) )
2892  {
2893  skip = true;
2894  }
2895 
2896  if ( skip )
2897  {
2898  dataDefinedValues.insert( QgsPalLayerSettings::ShapeDraw, QVariant( false ) ); // trigger value
2899  dataDefinedValues.remove( QgsPalLayerSettings::ShapeTransparency );
2900  dataDefinedValues.remove( QgsPalLayerSettings::ShapeKind );
2901  dataDefinedValues.remove( QgsPalLayerSettings::ShapeSVGFile );
2902  dataDefinedValues.remove( QgsPalLayerSettings::ShapeSizeX );
2903  dataDefinedValues.remove( QgsPalLayerSettings::ShapeSizeY );
2904  return; // don't bother evaluating values that won't be used
2905  }
2906 
2907  // data defined shape size units?
2908  dataDefinedValEval( "units", QgsPalLayerSettings::ShapeSizeUnits, exprVal );
2909 
2910  // data defined shape rotation type?
2911  if ( dataDefinedEvaluate( QgsPalLayerSettings::ShapeRotationType, exprVal ) )
2912  {
2913  QString rotstr = exprVal.toString().trimmed();
2914  QgsDebugMsgLevel( QString( "exprVal ShapeRotationType:%1" ).arg( rotstr ), 4 );
2915 
2916  if ( !rotstr.isEmpty() )
2917  {
2918  // "Sync"
2919  QgsPalLayerSettings::RotationType rottype = QgsPalLayerSettings::RotationSync;
2920 
2921  if ( rotstr.compare( "Offset", Qt::CaseInsensitive ) == 0 )
2922  {
2923  rottype = QgsPalLayerSettings::RotationOffset;
2924  }
2925  else if ( rotstr.compare( "Fixed", Qt::CaseInsensitive ) == 0 )
2926  {
2927  rottype = QgsPalLayerSettings::RotationFixed;
2928  }
2929  dataDefinedValues.insert( QgsPalLayerSettings::ShapeRotationType, QVariant(( int )rottype ) );
2930  }
2931  }
2932 
2933  // data defined shape rotation?
2934  dataDefinedValEval( "rotation180", QgsPalLayerSettings::ShapeRotation, exprVal );
2935 
2936  // data defined shape offset?
2937  dataDefinedValEval( "pointf", QgsPalLayerSettings::ShapeOffset, exprVal );
2938 
2939  // data defined shape offset units?
2940  dataDefinedValEval( "units", QgsPalLayerSettings::ShapeOffsetUnits, exprVal );
2941 
2942  // data defined shape radii?
2943  dataDefinedValEval( "pointf", QgsPalLayerSettings::ShapeRadii, exprVal );
2944 
2945  // data defined shape radii units?
2946  dataDefinedValEval( "units", QgsPalLayerSettings::ShapeRadiiUnits, exprVal );
2947 
2948  // data defined shape blend mode?
2949  dataDefinedValEval( "blendmode", QgsPalLayerSettings::ShapeBlendMode, exprVal );
2950 
2951  // data defined shape fill color?
2952  dataDefinedValEval( "color", QgsPalLayerSettings::ShapeFillColor, exprVal );
2953 
2954  // data defined shape border color?
2955  dataDefinedValEval( "color", QgsPalLayerSettings::ShapeBorderColor, exprVal );
2956 
2957  // data defined shape border width?
2958  dataDefinedValEval( "doublepos", QgsPalLayerSettings::ShapeBorderWidth, exprVal );
2959 
2960  // data defined shape border width units?
2961  dataDefinedValEval( "units", QgsPalLayerSettings::ShapeBorderWidthUnits, exprVal );
2962 
2963  // data defined shape join style?
2964  dataDefinedValEval( "joinstyle", QgsPalLayerSettings::ShapeJoinStyle, exprVal );
2965 
2966 }
2967 
2968 void QgsPalLayerSettings::parseDropShadow()
2969 {
2970  QVariant exprVal; // value() is repeatedly nulled on data defined evaluation and replaced when successful
2971 
2972  // data defined draw shadow?
2973  bool drawShadow = shadowDraw;
2974  if ( dataDefinedValEval( "bool", QgsPalLayerSettings::ShadowDraw, exprVal ) )
2975  {
2976  drawShadow = exprVal.toBool();
2977  }
2978 
2979  if ( !drawShadow )
2980  {
2981  return;
2982  }
2983 
2984  // data defined shadow transparency?
2985  int shadowTransp = shadowTransparency;
2986  if ( dataDefinedValEval( "transp", QgsPalLayerSettings::ShadowTransparency, exprVal ) )
2987  {
2988  shadowTransp = exprVal.toInt();
2989  }
2990 
2991  // data defined shadow offset distance?
2992  double shadowOffDist = shadowOffsetDist;
2993  if ( dataDefinedValEval( "doublepos", QgsPalLayerSettings::ShadowOffsetDist, exprVal ) )
2994  {
2995  shadowOffDist = exprVal.toDouble();
2996  }
2997 
2998  // data defined shadow offset distance?
2999  double shadowRad = shadowRadius;
3000  if ( dataDefinedValEval( "doublepos", QgsPalLayerSettings::ShadowRadius, exprVal ) )
3001  {
3002  shadowRad = exprVal.toDouble();
3003  }
3004 
3005  drawShadow = ( drawShadow && shadowTransp < 100 && !( shadowOffDist == 0.0 && shadowRad == 0.0 ) );
3006 
3007  if ( !drawShadow )
3008  {
3009  dataDefinedValues.insert( QgsPalLayerSettings::ShadowDraw, QVariant( false ) ); // trigger value
3010  dataDefinedValues.remove( QgsPalLayerSettings::ShadowTransparency );
3011  dataDefinedValues.remove( QgsPalLayerSettings::ShadowOffsetDist );
3012  dataDefinedValues.remove( QgsPalLayerSettings::ShadowRadius );
3013  return; // don't bother evaluating values that won't be used
3014  }
3015 
3016  // data defined shadow under type?
3017  if ( dataDefinedEvaluate( QgsPalLayerSettings::ShadowUnder, exprVal ) )
3018  {
3019  QString str = exprVal.toString().trimmed();
3020  QgsDebugMsgLevel( QString( "exprVal ShadowUnder:%1" ).arg( str ), 4 );
3021 
3022  if ( !str.isEmpty() )
3023  {
3024  // "Lowest"
3025  QgsPalLayerSettings::ShadowType shdwtype = QgsPalLayerSettings::ShadowLowest;
3026 
3027  if ( str.compare( "Text", Qt::CaseInsensitive ) == 0 )
3028  {
3029  shdwtype = QgsPalLayerSettings::ShadowText;
3030  }
3031  else if ( str.compare( "Buffer", Qt::CaseInsensitive ) == 0 )
3032  {
3033  shdwtype = QgsPalLayerSettings::ShadowBuffer;
3034  }
3035  else if ( str.compare( "Background", Qt::CaseInsensitive ) == 0 )
3036  {
3037  shdwtype = QgsPalLayerSettings::ShadowShape;
3038  }
3039  dataDefinedValues.insert( QgsPalLayerSettings::ShadowUnder, QVariant(( int )shdwtype ) );
3040  }
3041  }
3042 
3043  // data defined shadow offset angle?
3044  dataDefinedValEval( "rotation180", QgsPalLayerSettings::ShadowOffsetAngle, exprVal );
3045 
3046  // data defined shadow offset units?
3047  dataDefinedValEval( "units", QgsPalLayerSettings::ShadowOffsetUnits, exprVal );
3048 
3049  // data defined shadow radius?
3050  dataDefinedValEval( "double", QgsPalLayerSettings::ShadowRadius, exprVal );
3051 
3052  // data defined shadow radius units?
3053  dataDefinedValEval( "units", QgsPalLayerSettings::ShadowRadiusUnits, exprVal );
3054 
3055  // data defined shadow scale? ( gui bounds to 0-2000, no upper bound here )
3056  dataDefinedValEval( "intpos", QgsPalLayerSettings::ShadowScale, exprVal );
3057 
3058  // data defined shadow color?
3059  dataDefinedValEval( "color", QgsPalLayerSettings::ShadowColor, exprVal );
3060 
3061  // data defined shadow blend mode?
3062  dataDefinedValEval( "blendmode", QgsPalLayerSettings::ShadowBlendMode, exprVal );
3063 }

3065 int QgsPalLayerSettings::sizeToPixel( double size, const QgsRenderContext& c, SizeUnit unit, bool rasterfactor, const QgsMapUnitScale& mapUnitScale ) const
3066 {
3067  return ( int )( scaleToPixelContext( size, c, unit, rasterfactor, mapUnitScale ) + 0.5 );
3068 }
3069 
3070 double QgsPalLayerSettings::scaleToPixelContext( double size, const QgsRenderContext& c, SizeUnit unit, bool rasterfactor, const QgsMapUnitScale& mapUnitScale ) const
3071 {
3072  // if render context is that of device (i.e. not a scaled map), just return size
3073  double mapUnitsPerPixel = mapUnitScale.computeMapUnitsPerPixel( c );
3074 
3075  if ( unit == MapUnits && mapUnitsPerPixel > 0.0 )
3076  {
3077  size = size / mapUnitsPerPixel * ( rasterfactor ? c.rasterScaleFactor() : 1 );
3078  }
3079  else // e.g. in points or mm
3080  {
3081  double ptsTomm = ( unit == Points ? 0.352778 : 1 );
3082  size *= ptsTomm * c.scaleFactor() * ( rasterfactor ? c.rasterScaleFactor() : 1 );
3083  }
3084  return size;
3085 }

3177 {

3179 
3180  if ( !willUseLayer( layer ) )
3181  {
3182  return 0;
3183  }
3184 
3185  QgsDebugMsgLevel( "PREPARE LAYER " + layer->id(), 4 );
3186 
3187  // start with a temporary settings class, find out labeling info
3188  QgsPalLayerSettings lyrTmp;
3189  lyrTmp.readFromLayer( layer );
3190 
3191  if ( lyrTmp.fieldName.isEmpty() )
3192  {
3193  return 0;
3194  }
3195 
3196  if ( lyrTmp.isExpression )
3197  {
3198  QgsExpression exp( lyrTmp.fieldName );
3199  if ( exp.hasEvalError() )
3200  {
3201  QgsDebugMsgLevel( "Prepare error:" + exp.evalErrorString(), 4 );
3202  return 0;
3203  }
3204  }
3205  else
3206  {
3207  // If we aren't an expression, we check to see if we can find the column.
3208  if ( layer->fieldNameIndex( lyrTmp.fieldName ) == -1 )
3209  {
3210  return 0;
3211  }
3212  }
3213 
3214  // add layer settings to the pallabeling hashtable: <QgsVectorLayer*, QgsPalLayerSettings>
3215  mActiveLayers.insert( layer->id(), lyrTmp );
3216  // start using the reference to the layer in hashtable instead of local instance
3217  QgsPalLayerSettings& lyr = mActiveLayers[layer->id()];
3218 
3219  lyr.mCurFields = &( layer->pendingFields() );
3220 
3221  // add field indices for label's text, from expression or field
3222  if ( lyr.isExpression )
3223  {
3224  // prepare expression for use in QgsPalLayerSettings::registerFeature()
3225  QgsExpression* exp = lyr.getLabelExpression();
3226  exp->prepare( layer->pendingFields() );
3227  if ( exp->hasEvalError() )

3231  foreach ( QString name, exp->referencedColumns() )

3235  }
3236  }
3237  else

3244  for ( ; dIt != lyr.dataDefinedProperties.constEnd(); ++dIt )
3245  {
3246  QgsDataDefined* dd = dIt.value();
3247  if ( !dd->isActive() )
3248  {
3249  continue;
3250  }
3251 
3252  // NOTE: the following also prepares any expressions for later use
3253 
3254  // store parameters for data defined expressions

3257

3262

3276  case QgsPalLayerSettings::Line: arrangement = P_LINE; break;

3432  {
3433  return;
3434  }
3435 
3436  QgsDiagramRendererV2* dr = layerIt.value().renderer;
3437  if ( dr )
3438  {
3439  QList<QgsDiagramSettings> settingList = dr->diagramSettings();
3440  if ( settingList.size() > 0 )
3441  {
3442  double minScale = settingList.at( 0 ).minScaleDenominator;
3443  if ( minScale > 0 && context.rendererScale() < minScale )
3444  {
3445  return;
3446  }
3447 
3448  double maxScale = settingList.at( 0 ).maxScaleDenominator;
3449  if ( maxScale > 0 && context.rendererScale() > maxScale )
3450  {
3451  return;
3452  }
3453  }
3454  }
3455 
3456  //convert geom to geos
3457  QgsGeometry* geom = feat.geometry();
3458 
3459  // reproject the geometry if necessary (but don't modify the features
3460  // geometry so that geometry based expression keep working)
3461  QScopedPointer<QgsGeometry> clonedGeometry;
3462  if ( layerIt.value().ct )
3463  {
3464  geom = new QgsGeometry( *geom );
3465  clonedGeometry.reset( geom );
3466 
3467  try
3468  {
3469  geom->transform( *( layerIt.value().ct ) );
3470  }
3471  catch ( QgsCsException &cse )
3472  {
3473  Q_UNUSED( cse );
3474  QgsDebugMsgLevel( QString( "Ignoring feature %1 due transformation exception" ).arg( feat.id() ), 4 );
3475  return;
3476  }
3477  }
3478 
3479  const GEOSGeometry* geos_geom = geom->asGeos();
3480  if ( geos_geom == 0 )
3481  {
3482  return; // invalid geometry
3483  }
3484 
3485  //create PALGeometry with diagram = true
3486  QgsPalGeometry* lbl = new QgsPalGeometry( feat.id(), "", GEOSGeom_clone_r( QgsGeometry::getGEOSHandler(), geos_geom ) );
3487  lbl->setIsDiagram( true );
3488 
3489  // record the created geometry - it will be deleted at the end.
3490  layerIt.value().geometries.append( lbl );
3491 
3492  double diagramWidth = 0;
3493  double diagramHeight = 0;
3494  if ( dr )
3495  {
3496  QSizeF diagSize = dr->sizeMapUnits( feat, context );
3497  if ( diagSize.isValid() )
3498  {
3499  diagramWidth = diagSize.width();
3500  diagramHeight = diagSize.height();
3501  }
3502 
3503  //append the diagram attributes to lbl
3504  lbl->setDiagramAttributes( feat.attributes() );
3505  }
3506 
3507  // feature to the layer
3508  int ddColX = layerIt.value().xPosColumn;
3509  int ddColY = layerIt.value().yPosColumn;
3510  double ddPosX = 0.0;
3511  double ddPosY = 0.0;
3512  bool ddPos = ( ddColX >= 0 && ddColY >= 0 );
3513  if ( ddPos )
3514  {
3515  bool posXOk, posYOk;
3516  //data defined diagram position is always centered
3517  ddPosX = feat.attribute( ddColX ).toDouble( &posXOk ) - diagramWidth / 2.0;
3518  ddPosY = feat.attribute( ddColY ).toDouble( &posYOk ) - diagramHeight / 2.0;
3519  if ( !posXOk || !posYOk )
3520  {
3521  ddPos = false;
3522  }
3523  else
3524  {
3525  const QgsCoordinateTransform* ct = layerIt.value().ct;
3526  if ( ct )
3527  {
3528  double z = 0;
3529  ct->transformInPlace( ddPosX, ddPosY, z );
3530  }
3531  }
3532  }
3533 
3534  try
3535  {
3536  if ( !layerIt.value().palLayer->registerFeature( lbl->strId(), lbl, diagramWidth, diagramHeight, "", ddPosX, ddPosY, ddPos ) )
3537  {
3538  return;
3539  }
3540  }
3541  catch ( std::exception &e )
3542  {
3543  Q_UNUSED( e );
3544  QgsDebugMsgLevel( QString( "Ignoring feature %1 due PAL exception:" ).arg( feat.id() ) + QString::fromLatin1( e.what() ), 4 );
3545  return;
3546  }
3547 
3548  pal::Feature* palFeat = layerIt.value().palLayer->getFeature( lbl->strId() );
3549  QgsPoint ptZero = layerIt.value().xform->toMapCoordinates( 0, 0 );
3550  QgsPoint ptOne = layerIt.value().xform->toMapCoordinates( 1, 0 );
3551  palFeat->setDistLabel( qAbs( ptOne.x() - ptZero.x() ) * layerIt.value().dist );
3552 }

3560 void QgsPalLabeling::init( const QgsMapSettings& mapSettings )
3561 {
3562  mMapSettings = &mapSettings;
3563 
3564  // delete if exists already
3565  if ( mPal )
3566  delete mPal;
3567 
3568  mPal = new Pal;
3569 
3570  SearchMethod s;
3571  switch ( mSearch )
3572  {
3573  default:
3574  case Chain: s = CHAIN; break;
3575  case Popmusic_Tabu: s = POPMUSIC_TABU; break;
3576  case Popmusic_Chain: s = POPMUSIC_CHAIN; break;
3577  case Popmusic_Tabu_Chain: s = POPMUSIC_TABU_CHAIN; break;
3578  case Falp: s = FALP; break;
3579  }
3580  mPal->setSearch( s );
3581 
3582  // set number of candidates generated per feature
3583  mPal->setPointP( mCandPoint );
3584  mPal->setLineP( mCandLine );
3585  mPal->setPolyP( mCandPolygon );
3586 
3587  mPal->setShowPartial( mShowingPartialsLabels );
3588 
3589  clearActiveLayers(); // free any previous QgsDataDefined objects
3590  mActiveDiagramLayers.clear();
3591 }

3926 // helper function for checking for job cancellation within PAL
3927 static bool _palIsCancelled( void* ctx )
3928 {
3929  return (( QgsRenderContext* ) ctx )->renderingStopped();
3930 }
3931 
3932 void QgsPalLabeling::drawLabeling( QgsRenderContext& context )
3933 {
3934  Q_ASSERT( mMapSettings != NULL );
3935  QPainter* painter = context.painter();
3936  QgsRectangle extent = context.extent();
3937 
3938  mPal->registerCancellationCallback( &_palIsCancelled, &context );
3939 
3940  delete mResults;
3941  mResults = new QgsLabelingResults;
3942 
3943  QTime t;
3944  t.start();
3945 
3946  // do the labeling itself
3947  double scale = mMapSettings->scale(); // scale denominator
3948  QgsRectangle r = extent;
3949  double bbox[] = { r.xMinimum(), r.yMinimum(), r.xMaximum(), r.yMaximum() };
3950 
3951  std::list<LabelPosition*>* labels;
3952  pal::Problem* problem;
3953  try
3954  {
3955  problem = mPal->extractProblem( scale, bbox );
3956  }
3957  catch ( std::exception& e )
3958  {
3959  Q_UNUSED( e );
3960  QgsDebugMsgLevel( "PAL EXCEPTION :-( " + QString::fromLatin1( e.what() ), 4 );
3961  //mActiveLayers.clear(); // clean up
3962  return;
3963  }
3964 
3965  if ( context.renderingStopped() )
3966  return; // it has been cancelled
3967 
3968 #if 1 // XXX strk
3969  // features are pre-rotated but not scaled/translated,
3970  // so we only disable rotation here. Ideally, they'd be
3971  // also pre-scaled/translated, as suggested here:
3972  // http://hub.qgis.org/issues/11856
3973  QgsMapToPixel xform = mMapSettings->mapToPixel();
3974  xform.setMapRotation( 0, 0, 0 );
3975 #else
3976  const QgsMapToPixel& xform = mMapSettings->mapToPixel();
3977 #endif
3978 
3979  // draw rectangles with all candidates
3980  // this is done before actual solution of the problem
3981  // before number of candidates gets reduced
3982  mCandidates.clear();
3983  if ( mShowingCandidates && problem )
3984  {
3985  painter->setPen( QColor( 0, 0, 0, 64 ) );
3986  painter->setBrush( Qt::NoBrush );
3987  for ( int i = 0; i < problem->getNumFeatures(); i++ )
3988  {
3989  for ( int j = 0; j < problem->getFeatureCandidateCount( i ); j++ )
3990  {
3991  pal::LabelPosition* lp = problem->getFeatureCandidate( i, j );
3992 
3993  drawLabelCandidateRect( lp, painter, &xform );
3994  }
3995  }
3996  }
3997 
3998  // find the solution
3999  labels = mPal->solveProblem( problem, mShowingAllLabels );
4000 
4001  QgsDebugMsgLevel( QString( "LABELING work: %1 ms ... labels# %2" ).arg( t.elapsed() ).arg( labels->size() ), 4 );
4002  t.restart();
4003 
4004  if ( context.renderingStopped() )
4005  {
4006  delete problem;
4007  delete labels;
4008  deleteTemporaryData();
4009  return;
4010  }
4011 
4012  painter->setRenderHint( QPainter::Antialiasing );
4013 
4014  // draw the labels
4015  std::list<LabelPosition*>::iterator it = labels->begin();
4016  for ( ; it != labels->end(); ++it )
4017  {
4018  if ( context.renderingStopped() )
4019  break;
4020 
4021  QgsPalGeometry* palGeometry = dynamic_cast< QgsPalGeometry* >(( *it )->getFeaturePart()->getUserGeometry() );
4022  if ( !palGeometry )
4023  {
4024  continue;
4025  }
4026 
4027  //layer names
4028  QString layerName = QString::fromUtf8(( *it )->getLayerName() );
4029  if ( palGeometry->isDiagram() )
4030  {
4031  QgsFeature feature;
4032  //render diagram
4033  QHash<QString, QgsDiagramLayerSettings>::iterator dit = mActiveDiagramLayers.begin();
4034  for ( dit = mActiveDiagramLayers.begin(); dit != mActiveDiagramLayers.end(); ++dit )
4035  {
4036  if ( QString( dit.key() + "d" ) == layerName )
4037  {
4038  feature.setFields( &dit.value().fields );
4039  palGeometry->feature( feature );
4040  QgsPoint outPt = xform.transform(( *it )->getX(), ( *it )->getY() );
4041  dit.value().renderer->renderDiagram( feature, context, outPt.toQPointF() );
4042  }
4043  }
4044 
4045  //insert into label search tree to manipulate position interactively
4046  if ( mResults->mLabelSearchTree )
4047  {
4048  //for diagrams, remove the additional 'd' at the end of the layer id
4049  QString layerId = layerName;
4050  layerId.chop( 1 );
4051  mResults->mLabelSearchTree->insertLabel( *it, QString( palGeometry->strId() ).toInt(), QString( "" ), layerId, QFont(), true, false );
4052  }
4053  continue;
4054  }
4055 
4056  const QgsPalLayerSettings& lyr = layer( layerName );
4057 
4058  // Copy to temp, editable layer settings
4059  // these settings will be changed by any data defined values, then used for rendering label components
4060  // settings may be adjusted during rendering of components
4061  QgsPalLayerSettings tmpLyr( lyr );
4062 
4063  // apply any previously applied data defined settings for the label
4064  const QMap< QgsPalLayerSettings::DataDefinedProperties, QVariant >& ddValues = palGeometry->dataDefinedValues();
4065 
4066  //font
4067  QFont dFont = palGeometry->definedFont();
4068  // following debug is >= Qt 4.8 only ( because of QFont::styleName() )
4069 #if QT_VERSION >= 0x040800
4070  QgsDebugMsgLevel( QString( "PAL font tmpLyr: %1, Style: %2" ).arg( tmpLyr.textFont.toString() ).arg( QFontInfo( tmpLyr.textFont ).styleName() ), 4 );
4071  QgsDebugMsgLevel( QString( "PAL font definedFont: %1, Style: %2" ).arg( dFont.toString() ).arg( dFont.styleName() ), 4 );
4072 #endif
4073  tmpLyr.textFont = dFont;
4074 
4075  // update tmpLyr with any data defined text style values
4076  dataDefinedTextStyle( tmpLyr, ddValues );
4077 
4078  // update tmpLyr with any data defined text buffer values
4079  dataDefinedTextBuffer( tmpLyr, ddValues );
4080 
4081  // update tmpLyr with any data defined text formatting values
4082  dataDefinedTextFormatting( tmpLyr, ddValues );
4083 
4084  // update tmpLyr with any data defined shape background values
4085  dataDefinedShapeBackground( tmpLyr, ddValues );
4086 
4087  // update tmpLyr with any data defined drop shadow values
4088  dataDefinedDropShadow( tmpLyr, ddValues );
4089 
4090 
4091  tmpLyr.showingShadowRects = mShowingShadowRects;
4092 
4093  // Render the components of a label in reverse order
4094  // (backgrounds -> text)
4095 
4096  if ( tmpLyr.shadowDraw && tmpLyr.shadowUnder == QgsPalLayerSettings::ShadowLowest )
4097  {
4098  if ( tmpLyr.shapeDraw )
4099  {
4100  tmpLyr.shadowUnder = QgsPalLayerSettings::ShadowShape;
4101  }
4102  else if ( tmpLyr.bufferDraw )
4103  {
4104  tmpLyr.shadowUnder = QgsPalLayerSettings::ShadowBuffer;
4105  }
4106  else
4107  {
4108  tmpLyr.shadowUnder = QgsPalLayerSettings::ShadowText;
4109  }
4110  }
4111 
4112  if ( tmpLyr.shapeDraw )
4113  {
4114  drawLabel( *it, context, tmpLyr, LabelShape );
4115  }
4116 
4117  if ( tmpLyr.bufferDraw )
4118  {
4119  drawLabel( *it, context, tmpLyr, LabelBuffer );
4120  }
4121 
4122  drawLabel( *it, context, tmpLyr, LabelText );
4123 
4124  if ( mResults->mLabelSearchTree )
4125  {
4126  QString labeltext = (( QgsPalGeometry* )( *it )->getFeaturePart()->getUserGeometry() )->text();
4127  mResults->mLabelSearchTree->insertLabel( *it, QString( palGeometry->strId() ).toInt(), layerName, labeltext, dFont, false, palGeometry->isPinned() );
4128  }
4129  }
4130 
4131  // Reset composition mode for further drawing operations
4132  painter->setCompositionMode( QPainter::CompositionMode_SourceOver );
4133 
4134  QgsDebugMsgLevel( QString( "LABELING draw: %1 ms" ).arg( t.elapsed() ), 4 );
4135 
4136  delete problem;
4137  delete labels;
4138  deleteTemporaryData();
4139 }

4141 void QgsPalLabeling::deleteTemporaryData()
4142 {
4143  // delete all allocated geometries for features
4144  QHash<QString, QgsPalLayerSettings>::iterator lit;
4145  for ( lit = mActiveLayers.begin(); lit != mActiveLayers.end(); ++lit )
4146  {
4147  QgsPalLayerSettings& lyr = lit.value();
4148  for ( QList<QgsPalGeometry*>::iterator git = lyr.geometries.begin(); git != lyr.geometries.end(); ++git )
4149  delete *git;
4150  if ( lyr.limitNumLabels )
4151  {
4152  QgsDebugMsgLevel( QString( "mFeaturesToLabel: %1" ).arg( lyr.mFeaturesToLabel ), 4 );
4153  QgsDebugMsgLevel( QString( "maxNumLabels: %1" ).arg( lyr.maxNumLabels ), 4 );
4154  QgsDebugMsgLevel( QString( "mFeatsSendingToPal: %1" ).arg( lyr.mFeatsSendingToPal ), 4 );
4155  QgsDebugMsgLevel( QString( "mFeatsRegPal: %1" ).arg( lyr.geometries.count() ), 4 );
4156  }
4157  lyr.geometries.clear();
4158  }
4159 
4160  //delete all allocated geometries for diagrams
4161  QHash<QString, QgsDiagramLayerSettings>::iterator dIt = mActiveDiagramLayers.begin();
4162  for ( ; dIt != mActiveDiagramLayers.end(); ++dIt )
4163  {
4164  QgsDiagramLayerSettings& dls = dIt.value();
4165  for ( QList<QgsPalGeometry*>::iterator git = dls.geometries.begin(); git != dls.geometries.end(); ++git )
4166  {
4167  delete *git;
4168  }
4169  dls.geometries.clear();
4170  }
4171 }

4219 void QgsPalLabeling::drawLabelCandidateRect( pal::LabelPosition* lp, QPainter* painter, const QgsMapToPixel* xform )
4220 {
4221  QgsPoint outPt = xform->transform( lp->getX(), lp->getY() );
4222 
4223  painter->save();
4224 
4225 #if 0 // TODO: generalize some of this
4226  double w = lp->getWidth();
4227  double h = lp->getHeight();
4228  double cx = lp->getX() + w / 2.0;
4229  double cy = lp->getY() + h / 2.0;
4230  double scale = 1.0 / xform->mapUnitsPerPixel();
4231  double rotation = xform->mapRotation();
4232  double sw = w * scale;
4233  double sh = h * scale;
4234  QRectF rect( -sw / 2, -sh / 2, sw, sh );
4235 
4236  painter->translate( xform->transform( QPointF( cx, cy ) ).toQPointF() );
4237  if ( rotation )
4238  {
4239  // Only if not horizontal
4240  if ( lp->getFeaturePart()->getLayer()->getArrangement() != P_POINT &&
4241  lp->getFeaturePart()->getLayer()->getArrangement() != P_POINT_OVER &&
4242  lp->getFeaturePart()->getLayer()->getArrangement() != P_HORIZ )
4243  {
4244  painter->rotate( rotation );
4245  }
4246  }
4247  painter->translate( rect.bottomLeft() );
4248  painter->rotate( -lp->getAlpha() * 180 / M_PI );
4249  painter->translate( -rect.bottomLeft() );
4250 #else
4251  QgsPoint outPt2 = xform->transform( lp->getX() + lp->getWidth(), lp->getY() + lp->getHeight() );
4252  QRectF rect( 0, 0, outPt2.x() - outPt.x(), outPt2.y() - outPt.y() );
4253  painter->translate( QPointF( outPt.x(), outPt.y() ) );
4254  painter->rotate( -lp->getAlpha() * 180 / M_PI );
4255 #endif
4256 
4257  painter->drawRect( rect );
4258  painter->restore();
4259 
4260  // save the rect
4261  rect.moveTo( outPt.x(), outPt.y() );
4262  mCandidates.append( QgsLabelCandidate( rect, lp->getCost() * 1000 ) );
4263 
4264  // show all parts of the multipart label
4265  if ( lp->getNextPart() )
4266  drawLabelCandidateRect( lp->getNextPart(), painter, xform );
4267 }
4268 
4269 void QgsPalLabeling::drawLabel( pal::LabelPosition* label, QgsRenderContext& context, QgsPalLayerSettings& tmpLyr, DrawLabelType drawType, double dpiRatio )
4270 {
4271  // NOTE: this is repeatedly called for multi-part labels
4272  QPainter* painter = context.painter();
4273 #if 1 // XXX strk
4274  // features are pre-rotated but not scaled/translated,
4275  // so we only disable rotation here. Ideally, they'd be
4276  // also pre-scaled/translated, as suggested here:
4277  // http://hub.qgis.org/issues/11856
4278  QgsMapToPixel xform = context.mapToPixel();
4279  xform.setMapRotation( 0, 0, 0 );
4280 #else
4281  const QgsMapToPixel& xform = context.mapToPixel();
4282 #endif
4283 
4284  QgsLabelComponent component;
4285  component.setDpiRatio( dpiRatio );
4286 
4287  QgsPoint outPt = xform.transform( label->getX(), label->getY() );
4288 // QgsPoint outPt2 = xform->transform( label->getX() + label->getWidth(), label->getY() + label->getHeight() );
4289 // QRectF labelRect( 0, 0, outPt2.x() - outPt.x(), outPt2.y() - outPt.y() );
4290 
4291  component.setOrigin( outPt );
4292  component.setRotation( label->getAlpha() );
4293 
4294  if ( drawType == QgsPalLabeling::LabelShape )
4295  {
4296  // get rotated label's center point
4297  QgsPoint centerPt( outPt );
4298  QgsPoint outPt2 = xform.transform( label->getX() + label->getWidth() / 2,
4299  label->getY() + label->getHeight() / 2 );
4300 
4301  double xc = outPt2.x() - outPt.x();
4302  double yc = outPt2.y() - outPt.y();
4303 
4304  double angle = -label->getAlpha();
4305  double xd = xc * cos( angle ) - yc * sin( angle );
4306  double yd = xc * sin( angle ) + yc * cos( angle );
4307 
4308  centerPt.setX( centerPt.x() + xd );
4309  centerPt.setY( centerPt.y() + yd );
4310 
4311  component.setCenter( centerPt );
4312  component.setSize( QgsPoint( label->getWidth(), label->getHeight() ) );
4313 
4314  drawLabelBackground( context, component, tmpLyr );
4315  }
4316 
4317  else if ( drawType == QgsPalLabeling::LabelBuffer
4318  || drawType == QgsPalLabeling::LabelText )
4319  {
4320 
4321  // TODO: optimize access :)
4322  QString txt = (( QgsPalGeometry* )label->getFeaturePart()->getUserGeometry() )->text( label->getPartId() );
4323  QFontMetricsF* labelfm = (( QgsPalGeometry* )label->getFeaturePart()->getUserGeometry() )->getLabelFontMetrics();
4324 
4325  //add the direction symbol if needed
4326  if ( !txt.isEmpty() && tmpLyr.placement == QgsPalLayerSettings::Line &&
4327  tmpLyr.addDirectionSymbol )
4328  {
4329  bool prependSymb = false;
4330  QString symb = tmpLyr.rightDirectionSymbol;
4331 
4332  if ( label->getReversed() )
4333  {
4334  prependSymb = true;
4335  symb = tmpLyr.leftDirectionSymbol;
4336  }
4337 
4338  if ( tmpLyr.reverseDirectionSymbol )
4339  {
4340  if ( symb == tmpLyr.rightDirectionSymbol )
4341  {
4342  prependSymb = true;
4343  symb = tmpLyr.leftDirectionSymbol;
4344  }
4345  else
4346  {
4347  prependSymb = false;
4348  symb = tmpLyr.rightDirectionSymbol;
4349  }
4350  }
4351 
4352  if ( tmpLyr.placeDirectionSymbol == QgsPalLayerSettings::SymbolAbove )
4353  {
4354  prependSymb = true;
4355  symb = symb + QString( "\n" );
4356  }
4357  else if ( tmpLyr.placeDirectionSymbol == QgsPalLayerSettings::SymbolBelow )
4358  {
4359  prependSymb = false;
4360  symb = QString( "\n" ) + symb;
4361  }
4362 
4363  if ( prependSymb )
4364  {
4365  txt.prepend( symb );
4366  }
4367  else
4368  {
4369  txt.append( symb );
4370  }
4371  }
4372 
4373  //QgsDebugMsgLevel( "drawLabel " + txt, 4 );
4374  QStringList multiLineList = QgsPalLabeling::splitToLines( txt, tmpLyr.wrapChar );
4375  int lines = multiLineList.size();
4376 
4377  double labelWidest = 0.0;
4378  for ( int i = 0; i < lines; ++i )
4379  {
4380  double labelWidth = labelfm->width( multiLineList.at( i ) );
4381  if ( labelWidth > labelWidest )
4382  {
4383  labelWidest = labelWidth;
4384  }
4385  }
4386 
4387  double labelHeight = labelfm->ascent() + labelfm->descent(); // ignore +1 for baseline
4388  // double labelHighest = labelfm->height() + ( double )(( lines - 1 ) * labelHeight * tmpLyr.multilineHeight );
4389 
4390  // needed to move bottom of text's descender to within bottom edge of label
4391  double ascentOffset = 0.25 * labelfm->ascent(); // labelfm->descent() is not enough
4392 
4393  for ( int i = 0; i < lines; ++i )
4394  {
4395  painter->save();
4396 #if 0 // TODO: generalize some of this
4397  LabelPosition* lp = label;
4398  double w = lp->getWidth();
4399  double h = lp->getHeight();
4400  double cx = lp->getX() + w / 2.0;
4401  double cy = lp->getY() + h / 2.0;
4402  double scale = 1.0 / xform->mapUnitsPerPixel();
4403  double rotation = xform->mapRotation();
4404  double sw = w * scale;
4405  double sh = h * scale;
4406  QRectF rect( -sw / 2, -sh / 2, sw, sh );
4407  painter->translate( xform->transform( QPointF( cx, cy ) ).toQPointF() );
4408  if ( rotation )
4409  {
4410  // Only if not horizontal
4411  if ( lp->getFeaturePart()->getLayer()->getArrangement() != P_POINT &&
4412  lp->getFeaturePart()->getLayer()->getArrangement() != P_POINT_OVER &&
4413  lp->getFeaturePart()->getLayer()->getArrangement() != P_HORIZ )
4414  {
4415  painter->rotate( rotation );
4416  }
4417  }
4418  painter->translate( rect.bottomLeft() );
4419  painter->rotate( -lp->getAlpha() * 180 / M_PI );
4420 #else
4421  painter->translate( QPointF( outPt.x(), outPt.y() ) );
4422  painter->rotate( -label->getAlpha() * 180 / M_PI );
4423 #endif
4424 
4425  // scale down painter: the font size has been multiplied by raster scale factor
4426  // to workaround a Qt font scaling bug with small font sizes
4427  painter->scale( 1.0 / tmpLyr.rasterCompressFactor, 1.0 / tmpLyr.rasterCompressFactor );
4428 
4429  // figure x offset for horizontal alignment of multiple lines
4430  double xMultiLineOffset = 0.0;
4431  double labelWidth = labelfm->width( multiLineList.at( i ) );
4432  if ( lines > 1 && tmpLyr.multilineAlign != QgsPalLayerSettings::MultiLeft )
4433  {
4434  double labelWidthDiff = labelWidest - labelWidth;
4435  if ( tmpLyr.multilineAlign == QgsPalLayerSettings::MultiCenter )
4436  {
4437  labelWidthDiff /= 2;
4438  }
4439  xMultiLineOffset = labelWidthDiff;
4440  //QgsDebugMsgLevel( QString( "xMultiLineOffset: %1" ).arg( xMultiLineOffset ), 4 );
4441  }
4442 
4443  double yMultiLineOffset = ( lines - 1 - i ) * labelHeight * tmpLyr.multilineHeight;
4444  painter->translate( QPointF( xMultiLineOffset, - ascentOffset - yMultiLineOffset ) );
4445 
4446  component.setText( multiLineList.at( i ) );
4447  component.setSize( QgsPoint( labelWidth, labelHeight ) );
4448  component.setOffset( QgsPoint( 0.0, -ascentOffset ) );
4449  component.setRotation( -component.rotation() * 180 / M_PI );
4450  component.setRotationOffset( 0.0 );
4451 
4452  if ( drawType == QgsPalLabeling::LabelBuffer )
4453  {
4454  // draw label's buffer
4455  drawLabelBuffer( context, component, tmpLyr );
4456  }
4457  else
4458  {
4459  // draw label's text, QPainterPath method
4460  QPainterPath path;
4461  path.addText( 0, 0, tmpLyr.textFont, component.text() );
4462 
4463  // store text's drawing in QPicture for drop shadow call
4464  QPicture textPict;
4465  QPainter textp;
4466  textp.begin( &textPict );
4467  textp.setPen( Qt::NoPen );
4468  textp.setBrush( tmpLyr.textColor );
4469  textp.drawPath( path );
4470  // TODO: why are some font settings lost on drawPicture() when using drawText() inside QPicture?
4471  // e.g. some capitalization options, but not others
4472  //textp.setFont( tmpLyr.textFont );
4473  //textp.setPen( tmpLyr.textColor );
4474  //textp.drawText( 0, 0, component.text() );
4475  textp.end();
4476 
4477  if ( tmpLyr.shadowDraw && tmpLyr.shadowUnder == QgsPalLayerSettings::ShadowText )
4478  {
4479  component.setPicture( &textPict );
4480  component.setPictureBuffer( 0.0 ); // no pen width to deal with
4481  component.setOrigin( QgsPoint( 0.0, 0.0 ) );
4482 
4483  drawLabelShadow( context, component, tmpLyr );
4484  }
4485 
4486  // paint the text
4487  if ( context.useAdvancedEffects() )
4488  {
4489  painter->setCompositionMode( tmpLyr.blendMode );
4490  }
4491 
4492  // scale for any print output or image saving @ specific dpi
4493  painter->scale( component.dpiRatio(), component.dpiRatio() );
4494 
4495  if ( mDrawOutlineLabels )
4496  {
4497  // draw outlined text
4498  _fixQPictureDPI( painter );
4499  painter->drawPicture( 0, 0, textPict );
4500  }
4501  else
4502  {
4503  // draw text as text (for SVG and PDF exports)
4504  painter->setFont( tmpLyr.textFont );
4505  painter->setPen( tmpLyr.textColor );
4506  painter->setRenderHint( QPainter::TextAntialiasing );
4507  painter->drawText( 0, 0, component.text() );
4508  }
4509  }
4510  painter->restore();
4511  }
4512  }
4513 
4514  // NOTE: this used to be within above multi-line loop block, at end. (a mistake since 2010? [LS])
4515  if ( label->getNextPart() )
4516  drawLabel( label->getNextPart(), context, tmpLyr, drawType, dpiRatio );
4517 }
4518 
4519 void QgsPalLabeling::drawLabelBuffer( QgsRenderContext& context,
4520  const QgsLabelComponent& component,
4521  const QgsPalLayerSettings& tmpLyr )
4522 {
4523  QPainter* p = context.painter();
4524 
4525  double penSize = tmpLyr.scaleToPixelContext( tmpLyr.bufferSize, context,
4526  ( tmpLyr.bufferSizeInMapUnits ? QgsPalLayerSettings::MapUnits : QgsPalLayerSettings::MM ), true, tmpLyr.bufferSizeMapUnitScale );
4527 
4528  QPainterPath path;
4529  path.addText( 0, 0, tmpLyr.textFont, component.text() );
4530  QPen pen( tmpLyr.bufferColor );
4531  pen.setWidthF( penSize );
4532  pen.setJoinStyle( tmpLyr.bufferJoinStyle );
4533  QColor tmpColor( tmpLyr.bufferColor );
4534  // honor pref for whether to fill buffer interior
4535  if ( tmpLyr.bufferNoFill )
4536  {
4537  tmpColor.setAlpha( 0 );
4538  }
4539 
4540  // store buffer's drawing in QPicture for drop shadow call
4541  QPicture buffPict;
4542  QPainter buffp;
4543  buffp.begin( &buffPict );
4544  buffp.setPen( pen );
4545  buffp.setBrush( tmpColor );
4546  buffp.drawPath( path );
4547  buffp.end();
4548 
4549  if ( tmpLyr.shadowDraw && tmpLyr.shadowUnder == QgsPalLayerSettings::ShadowBuffer )
4550  {
4551  QgsLabelComponent bufferComponent = component;
4552  bufferComponent.setOrigin( QgsPoint( 0.0, 0.0 ) );
4553  bufferComponent.setPicture( &buffPict );
4554  bufferComponent.setPictureBuffer( penSize / 2.0 );
4555  drawLabelShadow( context, bufferComponent, tmpLyr );
4556  }
4557 
4558  p->save();
4559  if ( context.useAdvancedEffects() )
4560  {
4561  p->setCompositionMode( tmpLyr.bufferBlendMode );
4562  }
4563 // p->setPen( pen );
4564 // p->setBrush( tmpColor );
4565 // p->drawPath( path );
4566 
4567  // scale for any print output or image saving @ specific dpi
4568  p->scale( component.dpiRatio(), component.dpiRatio() );
4569  _fixQPictureDPI( p );
4570  p->drawPicture( 0, 0, buffPict );
4571  p->restore();
4572 }
4573 
4574 void QgsPalLabeling::drawLabelBackground( QgsRenderContext& context,
4575  QgsLabelComponent component,
4576  const QgsPalLayerSettings& tmpLyr )
4577 {
4578  QPainter* p = context.painter();
4579  double labelWidth = component.size().x(), labelHeight = component.size().y();
4580  //QgsDebugMsgLevel( QString( "Background label rotation: %1" ).arg( component.rotation() ), 4 );
4581 
4582  // shared calculations between shapes and SVG
4583 
4584  // configure angles, set component rotation and rotationOffset
4585  if ( tmpLyr.shapeRotationType != QgsPalLayerSettings::RotationFixed )
4586  {
4587  component.setRotation( -( component.rotation() * 180 / M_PI ) ); // RotationSync
4588  component.setRotationOffset(
4589  tmpLyr.shapeRotationType == QgsPalLayerSettings::RotationOffset ? tmpLyr.shapeRotation : 0.0 );
4590  }
4591  else // RotationFixed
4592  {
4593  component.setRotation( 0.0 ); // don't use label's rotation
4594  component.setRotationOffset( tmpLyr.shapeRotation );
4595  }
4596 
4597  // mm to map units conversion factor
4598  double mmToMapUnits = tmpLyr.shapeSizeMapUnitScale.computeMapUnitsPerPixel( context ) * context.scaleFactor();
4599 
4600  // TODO: the following label-buffered generated shapes and SVG symbols should be moved into marker symbology classes
4601 
4602  if ( tmpLyr.shapeType == QgsPalLayerSettings::ShapeSVG )
4603  {
4604  // all calculations done in shapeSizeUnits, which are then passed to symbology class for painting
4605 
4606  if ( tmpLyr.shapeSVGFile.isEmpty() )
4607  return;
4608 
4609  double sizeOut = 0.0;
4610  // only one size used for SVG sizing/scaling (no use of shapeSize.y() or Y field in gui)
4611  if ( tmpLyr.shapeSizeType == QgsPalLayerSettings::SizeFixed )
4612  {
4613  sizeOut = tmpLyr.shapeSize.x();
4614  }
4615  else if ( tmpLyr.shapeSizeType == QgsPalLayerSettings::SizeBuffer )
4616  {
4617  // add buffer to greatest dimension of label
4618  if ( labelWidth >= labelHeight )
4619  sizeOut = labelWidth;
4620  else if ( labelHeight > labelWidth )
4621  sizeOut = labelHeight;
4622 
4623  // label size in map units, convert to shapeSizeUnits, if different
4624  if ( tmpLyr.shapeSizeUnits == QgsPalLayerSettings::MM )
4625  {
4626  sizeOut /= mmToMapUnits;
4627  }
4628 
4629  // add buffer
4630  sizeOut += tmpLyr.shapeSize.x() * 2;
4631  }
4632 
4633  // don't bother rendering symbols smaller than 1x1 pixels in size
4634  // TODO: add option to not show any svgs under/over a certian size
4635  if ( tmpLyr.scaleToPixelContext( sizeOut, context, tmpLyr.shapeSizeUnits, false, tmpLyr.shapeSizeMapUnitScale ) < 1.0 )
4636  return;
4637 
4638  QgsStringMap map; // for SVG symbology marker
4639  map["name"] = QgsSymbolLayerV2Utils::symbolNameToPath( tmpLyr.shapeSVGFile.trimmed() );
4640  map["size"] = QString::number( sizeOut );
4641  map["size_unit"] = QgsSymbolLayerV2Utils::encodeOutputUnit(
4642  tmpLyr.shapeSizeUnits == QgsPalLayerSettings::MapUnits ? QgsSymbolV2::MapUnit : QgsSymbolV2::MM );
4643  map["angle"] = QString::number( 0.0 ); // angle is handled by this local painter
4644 
4645  // offset is handled by this local painter
4646  // TODO: see why the marker renderer doesn't seem to translate offset *after* applying rotation
4647  //map["offset"] = QgsSymbolLayerV2Utils::encodePoint( tmpLyr.shapeOffset );
4648  //map["offset_unit"] = QgsSymbolLayerV2Utils::encodeOutputUnit(
4649  // tmpLyr.shapeOffsetUnits == QgsPalLayerSettings::MapUnits ? QgsSymbolV2::MapUnit : QgsSymbolV2::MM );
4650 
4651  map["fill"] = tmpLyr.shapeFillColor.name();
4652  map["outline"] = tmpLyr.shapeBorderColor.name();
4653  map["outline-width"] = QString::number( tmpLyr.shapeBorderWidth );
4654 
4655  // TODO: fix overriding SVG symbol's border width/units in QgsSvgCache
4656  // currently broken, fall back to symbol's
4657  //map["outline_width_unit"] = QgsSymbolLayerV2Utils::encodeOutputUnit(
4658  // tmpLyr.shapeBorderWidthUnits == QgsPalLayerSettings::MapUnits ? QgsSymbolV2::MapUnit : QgsSymbolV2::MM );
4659 
4660  if ( tmpLyr.shadowDraw && tmpLyr.shadowUnder == QgsPalLayerSettings::ShadowShape )
4661  {
4662  // configure SVG shadow specs
4663  QgsStringMap shdwmap( map );
4664  shdwmap["fill"] = tmpLyr.shadowColor.name();
4665  shdwmap["outline"] = tmpLyr.shadowColor.name();
4666  shdwmap["size"] = QString::number( sizeOut * tmpLyr.rasterCompressFactor );
4667 
4668  // store SVG's drawing in QPicture for drop shadow call
4669  QPicture svgPict;
4670  QPainter svgp;
4671  svgp.begin( &svgPict );
4672 
4673  // draw shadow symbol
4674 
4675  // clone current render context map unit/mm conversion factors, but not
4676  // other map canvas parameters, then substitute this painter for use in symbology painting
4677  // NOTE: this is because the shadow needs to be scaled correctly for output to map canvas,
4678  // but will be created relative to the SVG's computed size, not the current map canvas
4679  QgsRenderContext shdwContext;
4680  shdwContext.setMapToPixel( context.mapToPixel() );
4681  shdwContext.setScaleFactor( context.scaleFactor() );
4682  shdwContext.setPainter( &svgp );
4683 
4684  QgsSymbolLayerV2* symShdwL = QgsSvgMarkerSymbolLayerV2::create( shdwmap );
4685  QgsSvgMarkerSymbolLayerV2* svgShdwM = static_cast<QgsSvgMarkerSymbolLayerV2*>( symShdwL );
4686  QgsSymbolV2RenderContext svgShdwContext( shdwContext, QgsSymbolV2::Mixed,
4687  ( 100.0 - ( double )( tmpLyr.shapeTransparency ) ) / 100.0 );
4688 
4689  double svgSize = tmpLyr.scaleToPixelContext( sizeOut, context, tmpLyr.shapeSizeUnits, true, tmpLyr.shapeSizeMapUnitScale );
4690  svgShdwM->renderPoint( QPointF( svgSize / 2, -svgSize / 2 ), svgShdwContext );
4691  svgp.end();
4692 
4693  component.setPicture( &svgPict );
4694  // TODO: when SVG symbol's border width/units is fixed in QgsSvgCache, adjust for it here
4695  component.setPictureBuffer( 0.0 );
4696 
4697  component.setSize( QgsPoint( svgSize, svgSize ) );
4698  component.setOffset( QgsPoint( 0.0, 0.0 ) );
4699 
4700  // rotate about origin center of SVG
4701  p->save();
4702  p->translate( component.center().x(), component.center().y() );
4703  p->rotate( component.rotation() );
4704  p->scale( 1.0 / tmpLyr.rasterCompressFactor, 1.0 / tmpLyr.rasterCompressFactor );
4705  double xoff = tmpLyr.scaleToPixelContext( tmpLyr.shapeOffset.x(), context, tmpLyr.shapeOffsetUnits, true, tmpLyr.shapeOffsetMapUnitScale );
4706  double yoff = tmpLyr.scaleToPixelContext( tmpLyr.shapeOffset.y(), context, tmpLyr.shapeOffsetUnits, true, tmpLyr.shapeOffsetMapUnitScale );
4707  p->translate( QPointF( xoff, yoff ) );
4708  p->rotate( component.rotationOffset() );
4709  p->translate( -svgSize / 2, svgSize / 2 );
4710 
4711  drawLabelShadow( context, component, tmpLyr );
4712  p->restore();
4713 
4714  delete svgShdwM;
4715  svgShdwM = 0;
4716  }
4717 
4718  // draw the actual symbol
4719  QgsSymbolLayerV2* symL = QgsSvgMarkerSymbolLayerV2::create( map );
4720  QgsSvgMarkerSymbolLayerV2* svgM = static_cast<QgsSvgMarkerSymbolLayerV2*>( symL );
4721  QgsSymbolV2RenderContext svgContext( context, QgsSymbolV2::Mixed,
4722  ( 100.0 - ( double )( tmpLyr.shapeTransparency ) ) / 100.0 );
4723 
4724  p->save();
4725  if ( context.useAdvancedEffects() )
4726  {
4727  p->setCompositionMode( tmpLyr.shapeBlendMode );
4728  }
4729  p->translate( component.center().x(), component.center().y() );
4730  p->rotate( component.rotation() );
4731  double xoff = tmpLyr.scaleToPixelContext( tmpLyr.shapeOffset.x(), context, tmpLyr.shapeOffsetUnits, false, tmpLyr.shapeOffsetMapUnitScale );
4732  double yoff = tmpLyr.scaleToPixelContext( tmpLyr.shapeOffset.y(), context, tmpLyr.shapeOffsetUnits, false, tmpLyr.shapeOffsetMapUnitScale );
4733  p->translate( QPointF( xoff, yoff ) );
4734  p->rotate( component.rotationOffset() );
4735  svgM->renderPoint( QPointF( 0, 0 ), svgContext );
4736  p->setCompositionMode( QPainter::CompositionMode_SourceOver ); // just to be sure
4737  p->restore();
4738 
4739  delete svgM;
4740  svgM = 0;
4741 
4742  }
4743  else // Generated Shapes
4744  {
4745  // all calculations done in shapeSizeUnits
4746 
4747  double w = labelWidth / ( tmpLyr.shapeSizeUnits == QgsPalLayerSettings::MM ? mmToMapUnits : 1 );
4748  double h = labelHeight / ( tmpLyr.shapeSizeUnits == QgsPalLayerSettings::MM ? mmToMapUnits : 1 );
4749 
4750  double xsize = tmpLyr.shapeSize.x();
4751  double ysize = tmpLyr.shapeSize.y();
4752 
4753  if ( tmpLyr.shapeSizeType == QgsPalLayerSettings::SizeFixed )
4754  {
4755  w = xsize;
4756  h = ysize;
4757  }
4758  else if ( tmpLyr.shapeSizeType == QgsPalLayerSettings::SizeBuffer )
4759  {
4760  if ( tmpLyr.shapeType == QgsPalLayerSettings::ShapeSquare )
4761  {
4762  if ( w > h )
4763  h = w;
4764  else if ( h > w )
4765  w = h;
4766  }
4767  else if ( tmpLyr.shapeType == QgsPalLayerSettings::ShapeCircle )
4768  {
4769  // start with label bound by circle
4770  h = sqrt( pow( w, 2 ) + pow( h, 2 ) );
4771  w = h;
4772  }
4773  else if ( tmpLyr.shapeType == QgsPalLayerSettings::ShapeEllipse )
4774  {
4775  // start with label bound by ellipse
4776  h = h / sqrt( 2.0 ) * 2;
4777  w = w / sqrt( 2.0 ) * 2;
4778  }
4779 
4780  w += xsize * 2;
4781  h += ysize * 2;
4782  }
4783 
4784  // convert everything over to map pixels from here on
4785  w = tmpLyr.scaleToPixelContext( w, context, tmpLyr.shapeSizeUnits, true, tmpLyr.shapeSizeMapUnitScale );
4786  h = tmpLyr.scaleToPixelContext( h, context, tmpLyr.shapeSizeUnits, true, tmpLyr.shapeSizeMapUnitScale );
4787 
4788  // offsets match those of symbology: -x = left, -y = up
4789  QRectF rect( -w / 2.0, - h / 2.0, w, h );
4790 
4791  if ( rect.isNull() )
4792  return;
4793 
4794  p->save();
4795  p->translate( QPointF( component.center().x(), component.center().y() ) );
4796  p->rotate( component.rotation() );
4797  double xoff = tmpLyr.scaleToPixelContext( tmpLyr.shapeOffset.x(), context, tmpLyr.shapeOffsetUnits, false, tmpLyr.shapeOffsetMapUnitScale );
4798  double yoff = tmpLyr.scaleToPixelContext( tmpLyr.shapeOffset.y(), context, tmpLyr.shapeOffsetUnits, false, tmpLyr.shapeOffsetMapUnitScale );
4799  p->translate( QPointF( xoff, yoff ) );
4800  p->rotate( component.rotationOffset() );
4801 
4802  double penSize = tmpLyr.scaleToPixelContext( tmpLyr.shapeBorderWidth, context, tmpLyr.shapeBorderWidthUnits, true, tmpLyr.shapeBorderWidthMapUnitScale );
4803 
4804  QPen pen;
4805  if ( tmpLyr.shapeBorderWidth > 0 )
4806  {
4807  pen.setColor( tmpLyr.shapeBorderColor );
4808  pen.setWidthF( penSize );
4809  if ( tmpLyr.shapeType == QgsPalLayerSettings::ShapeRectangle )
4810  pen.setJoinStyle( tmpLyr.shapeJoinStyle );
4811  }
4812  else
4813  {
4814  pen = Qt::NoPen;
4815  }
4816 
4817  // store painting in QPicture for shadow drawing
4818  QPicture shapePict;
4819  QPainter shapep;
4820  shapep.begin( &shapePict );
4821  shapep.setPen( pen );
4822  shapep.setBrush( tmpLyr.shapeFillColor );
4823 
4824  if ( tmpLyr.shapeType == QgsPalLayerSettings::ShapeRectangle
4825  || tmpLyr.shapeType == QgsPalLayerSettings::ShapeSquare )
4826  {
4827  if ( tmpLyr.shapeRadiiUnits == QgsPalLayerSettings::Percent )
4828  {
4829  shapep.drawRoundedRect( rect, tmpLyr.shapeRadii.x(), tmpLyr.shapeRadii.y(), Qt::RelativeSize );
4830  }
4831  else
4832  {
4833  double xRadius = tmpLyr.scaleToPixelContext( tmpLyr.shapeRadii.x(), context, tmpLyr.shapeRadiiUnits, true, tmpLyr.shapeRadiiMapUnitScale );
4834  double yRadius = tmpLyr.scaleToPixelContext( tmpLyr.shapeRadii.y(), context, tmpLyr.shapeRadiiUnits, true, tmpLyr.shapeRadiiMapUnitScale );
4835  shapep.drawRoundedRect( rect, xRadius, yRadius );
4836  }
4837  }
4838  else if ( tmpLyr.shapeType == QgsPalLayerSettings::ShapeEllipse
4839  || tmpLyr.shapeType == QgsPalLayerSettings::ShapeCircle )
4840  {
4841  shapep.drawEllipse( rect );
4842  }
4843  shapep.end();
4844 
4845  p->scale( 1.0 / tmpLyr.rasterCompressFactor, 1.0 / tmpLyr.rasterCompressFactor );
4846 
4847  if ( tmpLyr.shadowDraw && tmpLyr.shadowUnder == QgsPalLayerSettings::ShadowShape )
4848  {
4849  component.setPicture( &shapePict );
4850  component.setPictureBuffer( penSize / 2.0 );
4851 
4852  component.setSize( QgsPoint( rect.width(), rect.height() ) );
4853  component.setOffset( QgsPoint( rect.width() / 2, -rect.height() / 2 ) );
4854  drawLabelShadow( context, component, tmpLyr );
4855  }
4856 
4857  p->setOpacity(( 100.0 - ( double )( tmpLyr.shapeTransparency ) ) / 100.0 );
4858  if ( context.useAdvancedEffects() )
4859  {
4860  p->setCompositionMode( tmpLyr.shapeBlendMode );
4861  }
4862 
4863  // scale for any print output or image saving @ specific dpi
4864  p->scale( component.dpiRatio(), component.dpiRatio() );
4865  _fixQPictureDPI( p );
4866  p->drawPicture( 0, 0, shapePict );
4867  p->restore();
4868  }
4869 }
4870 
4871 void QgsPalLabeling::drawLabelShadow( QgsRenderContext& context,
4872  const QgsLabelComponent& component,
4873  const QgsPalLayerSettings& tmpLyr )
4874 {
4875  // incoming component sizes should be multiplied by rasterCompressFactor, as
4876  // this allows shadows to be created at paint device dpi (e.g. high resolution),
4877  // then scale device painter by 1.0 / rasterCompressFactor for output
4878 
4879  QPainter* p = context.painter();
4880  double componentWidth = component.size().x(), componentHeight = component.size().y();
4881  double xOffset = component.offset().x(), yOffset = component.offset().y();
4882  double pictbuffer = component.pictureBuffer();
4883 
4884  // generate pixmap representation of label component drawing
4885  bool mapUnits = ( tmpLyr.shadowRadiusUnits == QgsPalLayerSettings::MapUnits );
4886  double radius = tmpLyr.scaleToPixelContext( tmpLyr.shadowRadius, context, tmpLyr.shadowRadiusUnits, !mapUnits, tmpLyr.shadowRadiusMapUnitScale );
4887  radius /= ( mapUnits ? tmpLyr.vectorScaleFactor / component.dpiRatio() : 1 );
4888  radius = ( int )( radius + 0.5 );
4889 
4890  // TODO: add labeling gui option to adjust blurBufferClippingScale to minimize pixels, or
4891  // to ensure shadow isn't clipped too tight. (Or, find a better method of buffering)
4892  double blurBufferClippingScale = 3.75;
4893  int blurbuffer = ( radius > 17 ? 16 : radius ) * blurBufferClippingScale;
4894 
4895  QImage blurImg( componentWidth + ( pictbuffer * 2.0 ) + ( blurbuffer * 2.0 ),
4896  componentHeight + ( pictbuffer * 2.0 ) + ( blurbuffer * 2.0 ),
4897  QImage::Format_ARGB32_Premultiplied );
4898 
4899  // TODO: add labeling gui option to not show any shadows under/over a certian size
4900  // keep very small QImages from causing paint device issues, i.e. must be at least > 1
4901  int minBlurImgSize = 1;
4902  // max limitation on QgsSvgCache is 10,000 for screen, which will probably be reasonable for future caching here, too
4903  // 4 x QgsSvgCache limit for output to print/image at higher dpi
4904  // TODO: should it be higher, scale with dpi, or have no limit? Needs testing with very large labels rendered at high dpi output
4905  int maxBlurImgSize = 40000;
4906  if ( blurImg.isNull()
4907  || ( blurImg.width() < minBlurImgSize || blurImg.height() < minBlurImgSize )
4908  || ( blurImg.width() > maxBlurImgSize || blurImg.height() > maxBlurImgSize ) )
4909  return;
4910 
4911  blurImg.fill( QColor( Qt::transparent ).rgba() );
4912  QPainter pictp;
4913  if ( !pictp.begin( &blurImg ) )
4914  return;
4915  pictp.setRenderHints( QPainter::Antialiasing | QPainter::SmoothPixmapTransform );
4916  QPointF imgOffset( blurbuffer + pictbuffer + xOffset,
4917  blurbuffer + pictbuffer + componentHeight + yOffset );
4918 
4919  pictp.drawPicture( imgOffset,
4920  *component.picture() );
4921 
4922  // overlay shadow color
4923  pictp.setCompositionMode( QPainter::CompositionMode_SourceIn );
4924  pictp.fillRect( blurImg.rect(), tmpLyr.shadowColor );
4925  pictp.end();
4926 
4927  // blur the QImage in-place
4928  if ( tmpLyr.shadowRadius > 0.0 && radius > 0 )
4929  {
4930  QgsSymbolLayerV2Utils::blurImageInPlace( blurImg, blurImg.rect(), radius, tmpLyr.shadowRadiusAlphaOnly );
4931  }
4932 
4933  if ( tmpLyr.showingShadowRects ) // engine setting, not per layer
4934  {
4935  // debug rect for QImage shadow registration and clipping visualization
4936  QPainter picti;
4937  picti.begin( &blurImg );
4938  picti.setBrush( Qt::Dense7Pattern );
4939  QPen imgPen( QColor( 0, 0, 255, 255 ) );
4940  imgPen.setWidth( 1 );
4941  picti.setPen( imgPen );
4942  picti.setOpacity( 0.1 );
4943  picti.drawRect( 0, 0, blurImg.width(), blurImg.height() );
4944  picti.end();
4945  }
4946 
4947  double offsetDist = tmpLyr.scaleToPixelContext( tmpLyr.shadowOffsetDist, context, tmpLyr.shadowOffsetUnits, true, tmpLyr.shadowOffsetMapUnitScale );
4948  double angleRad = tmpLyr.shadowOffsetAngle * M_PI / 180; // to radians
4949  if ( tmpLyr.shadowOffsetGlobal )
4950  {
4951  // TODO: check for differences in rotation origin and cw/ccw direction,
4952  // when this shadow function is used for something other than labels
4953 
4954  // it's 0-->cw-->360 for labels
4955  //QgsDebugMsgLevel( QString( "Shadow aggregated label rotation (degrees): %1" ).arg( component.rotation() + component.rotationOffset() ), 4 );
4956  angleRad -= ( component.rotation() * M_PI / 180 + component.rotationOffset() * M_PI / 180 );
4957  }
4958 
4959  QPointF transPt( -offsetDist * cos( angleRad + M_PI / 2 ),
4960  -offsetDist * sin( angleRad + M_PI / 2 ) );
4961 
4962  p->save();
4963  p->setRenderHints( QPainter::Antialiasing | QPainter::SmoothPixmapTransform );
4964  if ( context.useAdvancedEffects() )
4965  {
4966  p->setCompositionMode( tmpLyr.shadowBlendMode );
4967  }
4968  p->setOpacity(( 100.0 - ( double )( tmpLyr.shadowTransparency ) ) / 100.0 );
4969 
4970  double scale = ( double )tmpLyr.shadowScale / 100.0;
4971  // TODO: scale from center/center, left/center or left/top, instead of default left/bottom?
4972  p->scale( scale, scale );
4973  if ( component.useOrigin() )
4974  {
4975  p->translate( component.origin().x(), component.origin().y() );
4976  }
4977  p->translate( transPt );
4978  p->translate( -imgOffset.x(),
4979  -imgOffset.y() );
4980  p->drawImage( 0, 0, blurImg );
4981  p->restore();
4982 
4983  // debug rects
4984  if ( tmpLyr.showingShadowRects ) // engine setting, not per layer
4985  {
4986  // draw debug rect for QImage painting registration
4987  p->save();
4988  p->setBrush( Qt::NoBrush );
4989  QPen imgPen( QColor( 255, 0, 0, 10 ) );
4990  imgPen.setWidth( 2 );
4991  imgPen.setStyle( Qt::DashLine );
4992  p->setPen( imgPen );
4993  p->scale( scale, scale );
4994  if ( component.useOrigin() )
4995  {
4996  p->translate( component.origin().x(), component.origin().y() );
4997  }
4998  p->translate( transPt );
4999  p->translate( -imgOffset.x(),
5000  -imgOffset.y() );
5001  p->drawRect( 0, 0, blurImg.width(), blurImg.height() );
5002  p->restore();
5003 
5004  // draw debug rect for passed in component dimensions
5005  p->save();
5006  p->setBrush( Qt::NoBrush );
5007  QPen componentRectPen( QColor( 0, 255, 0, 70 ) );
5008  componentRectPen.setWidth( 1 );
5009  if ( component.useOrigin() )
5010  {
5011  p->translate( component.origin().x(), component.origin().y() );
5012  }
5013  p->setPen( componentRectPen );
5014  p->drawRect( QRect( -xOffset, -componentHeight - yOffset, componentWidth, componentHeight ) );
5015  p->restore();
5016  }
5017 }

5019 void QgsPalLabeling::loadEngineSettings()
5020 {
5021  // start with engine defaults for new project, or project that has no saved settings
5022  Pal p;
5023  bool saved = false;
5024  mSearch = ( QgsPalLabeling::Search )( QgsProject::instance()->readNumEntry(
5025  "PAL", "/SearchMethod", ( int )p.getSearch(), &saved ) );
5026  mCandPoint = QgsProject::instance()->readNumEntry(
5027  "PAL", "/CandidatesPoint", p.getPointP(), &saved );
5028  mCandLine = QgsProject::instance()->readNumEntry(
5029  "PAL", "/CandidatesLine", p.getLineP(), &saved );
5030  mCandPolygon = QgsProject::instance()->readNumEntry(
5031  "PAL", "/CandidatesPolygon", p.getPolyP(), &saved );
5032  mShowingCandidates = QgsProject::instance()->readBoolEntry(
5033  "PAL", "/ShowingCandidates", false, &saved );
5034  mShowingShadowRects = QgsProject::instance()->readBoolEntry(
5035  "PAL", "/ShowingShadowRects", false, &saved );
5036  mShowingAllLabels = QgsProject::instance()->readBoolEntry(
5037  "PAL", "/ShowingAllLabels", false, &saved );
5038  mShowingPartialsLabels = QgsProject::instance()->readBoolEntry(
5039  "PAL", "/ShowingPartialsLabels", p.getShowPartial(), &saved );
5040  mDrawOutlineLabels = QgsProject::instance()->readBoolEntry(
5041  "PAL", "/DrawOutlineLabels", true, &saved );
5042 }
5043 
5044 void QgsPalLabeling::saveEngineSettings()
5045 {
5046  QgsProject::instance()->writeEntry( "PAL", "/SearchMethod", ( int )mSearch );
5047  QgsProject::instance()->writeEntry( "PAL", "/CandidatesPoint", mCandPoint );
5048  QgsProject::instance()->writeEntry( "PAL", "/CandidatesLine", mCandLine );
5049  QgsProject::instance()->writeEntry( "PAL", "/CandidatesPolygon", mCandPolygon );
5050  QgsProject::instance()->writeEntry( "PAL", "/ShowingCandidates", mShowingCandidates );
5051  QgsProject::instance()->writeEntry( "PAL", "/ShowingShadowRects", mShowingShadowRects );
5052  QgsProject::instance()->writeEntry( "PAL", "/ShowingAllLabels", mShowingAllLabels );
5053  QgsProject::instance()->writeEntry( "PAL", "/ShowingPartialsLabels", mShowingPartialsLabels );
5054  QgsProject::instance()->writeEntry( "PAL", "/DrawOutlineLabels", mDrawOutlineLabels );
5055 }

5060  QgsProject::instance()->removeEntry( "PAL", "/CandidatesPoint" );
5061  QgsProject::instance()->removeEntry( "PAL", "/CandidatesLine" );
5062  QgsProject::instance()->removeEntry( "PAL", "/CandidatesPolygon" );
5063  QgsProject::instance()->removeEntry( "PAL", "/ShowingCandidates" );
5064  QgsProject::instance()->removeEntry( "PAL", "/ShowingShadowRects" );
5065  QgsProject::instance()->removeEntry( "PAL", "/ShowingAllLabels" );
5066  QgsProject::instance()->removeEntry( "PAL", "/ShowingPartialsLabels" );
5067  QgsProject::instance()->removeEntry( "PAL", "/DrawOutlineLabels" );
5068 }

5093 QList<QgsLabelPosition> QgsLabelingResults::labelsAtPosition( const QgsPoint& p ) const
5094 {
5095  QList<QgsLabelPosition> positions;
5096 
5097  QList<QgsLabelPosition*> positionPointers;
5098  if ( mLabelSearchTree )
5099  {
5100  mLabelSearchTree->label( p, positionPointers );
5101  QList<QgsLabelPosition*>::const_iterator pointerIt = positionPointers.constBegin();
5102  for ( ; pointerIt != positionPointers.constEnd(); ++pointerIt )
5103  {
5104  positions.push_back( QgsLabelPosition( **pointerIt ) );
5105  }
5106  }
5107 
5108  return positions;
5109 }

5116  if ( mLabelSearchTree )

5119  QList<QgsLabelPosition*>::const_iterator pointerIt = positionPointers.constBegin();
5120  for ( ; pointerIt != positionPointers.constEnd(); ++pointerIt )
5121  {
5122  positions.push_back( QgsLabelPosition( **pointerIt ) );
5123  }
5124  }
5125 
5126  return positions;
